LONDON, PARIS & nICE

10 DAYS/9 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ width=”100%” custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”-31px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”30px|0px|21px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”13px|auto||200px||” custom_padding=”32px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ module_alignment=”center” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”94px” custom_margin=”-22px||-92px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT LONDON

Arrive at London Heathrow Airport and be transferred to the hotel. The rest of the day is free to explore local surroundings.

 

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”320px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”1px||0px|3px||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 02: LONDON – HOP ON HOP OFF

After breakfast today, take the 2 day hop on hop off tour. This tour gives you the best view of all London’s famous sights and has been carefully designed to show you all of the top London tourist attractions, including Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Trafalgar Square, Piccadilly Circus, The Houses of Parliament, Big Ben, Westminster Abbey, Tower of London and Buckingham Palace. Visit the London Eye which offers panoramic views of London. Zip around London town like a local on one of the city’s iconic double-decker buses. Travel to the Mall to see the Changing of the Guard. Outfitted in their world-famous tunics and busbies, the Queens Household Regiment marches to military music from St. James Palace to Buckingham Palace.  Hop off to explore the city’s historic sights and iconic architecture on foot, and glide down the River Thames on a sightseeing cruise to immerse yourself in the rich history and culture of the English capital. See art and antiquities from around the world at the UK’s largest British museum. Admire the spectacular glass roof of the Great Court, a work of art in its own right. Then, see the world-famous “Rosetta Stone,” the key to deciphering Egyptian hieroglyphics. Admire the controversial Parthenon Sculptures, taken from the Parthenon in Athens by Lord Elgin, the former British ambassador to the Ottoman Empire.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”177px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”||4px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: LONDON – HOP ON HOP OFF

After breakfast today, continue with the hop on hop off tour. Settle into a seat in the comfortable interior or on the open-air top deck of a double-decker bus and set off to tour the city at your own pace. Alternatively, stay on for the entire loop, enjoying complimentary Wi-Fi on board and listening to engaging commentary as you pass by the riverfront Houses of Parliament, and impressive St. Paul’s Cathedral. Get a different perspective on the bustling city admiring the city skyline and listening to on board commentary for a dose of English history—and humor! From there, stretch your legs on a royal themed guided walk from Trafalgar Square.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”233px” custom_margin=”-1px||-1px||true|” custom_padding=”5px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: LONDON TO PARIS

After breakfast check-out of the hotel and transfer to the airport for your flight to Paris. Arrive at CDG Airport and be transferred to the hotel. Enjoy our evening with a  night tour and river cruise. This night tour in Paris combines a panoramic city tour and a lovely river cruise, showing off the “City of Lights” from two different perspectives. Enjoy the views of the city and its monuments, bridges, and fountains as you discover for yourself the beautiful and dramatic facades lit up against the night sky. Drive by the Opera House, Louvre, Place de la Concorde, and along the Champs-Elysees from the comfort of the coach. The Seine River cruise portion of this tour will show you a very different perspective of breathtaking monuments like the Eiffel Tower, lit up bridges and more as you float down the river as far as the Ile de la Cité, the island home to the Notre Dame Cathedral and Conciergerie.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”93px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 05: PARIS – HOP ON HOP OFF

After breakfast today, take the hop on hop off tour. This tour of Paris has been designed to show you the city’s top landmarks and attractions, including the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame and Montmartre Make the most of your stay in Paris with this tour which includes a 1 day hop-on, hop-off sightseeing bus tour. The Paris bus tour takes you to all the iconic landmarks and attractions.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”507px” custom_margin=”2px||24px|||” custom_padding=”0px||1px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Arial,Oswald,Georgia”]

DAY 06: VISIT TO LOUVRES MUSEUM

After breakfast today, you visit the Louvres museum and do the audio tour. must-see attraction and discover under-appreciated treasures in this comprehensive tour. Skip-the-Line access gives you more time to absorb all that the massive museum has to offer.

DAY 07: PARIS TO NICE

After breakfast check-out of the hotel and transfer to the airport for your flight to Nice. On arrival in Nice transfer to hotel . The rest of the day is free to explore local surroundings.

DAY 08: FULL DAY: MONACO & PERCHED MEDIEVAL VILLAGES

Discover the villages crowning the French Riviera and the Monaco the Mediterranean pearl. Disclose the exclusive Monaco’s secrets! Vanguards the most moderns Country city in the world, Monaco it’s today a place where traditions and innovation goes together. Gaining lands over the sea stands the amazing district of Old-Fountain. (Fontvieille). Go around and have a look: it is holding the Stadium Louis II site of the AS Monaco, the industry and manufacturing, residential and even more. The Old Town (Vieilleville) at the top of the Rock with the home’s Prince HM Albert II and their Royal Family House, the Cathedral, Gardens, views, shops restaurants and snacks. The masterpiece of Prince Carlo III: the District of Montecarlo where stands the principal Casino and the major buildings of the classical old fashion zone. Any corner every place, their historical monuments, the greatest challenges of modernity and many improvements to contemplate on the Principality. Picture contest so, just grab your camera, sunglasses and a backpack to challenge yourself and explore unlimited the medieval villages of the French Riviera. Eze mysteries, views, perched trees; it gives you the chance to find in Fragonard a great ancient perfume factory, chapters of history, ramparts had been transformed as a relax place in its special lights and panoramic views. Unique place, Eze holds itself at the seafront of the Mediterranean Sea. Subsequently, towards the hinterland to discover Grasse, St. Paul de Vence, Tourettes-sur- Loup and Gourdon, let’s go to the villages perched go through to conquer the depths of the mountains.

DAY 09: NICE – HOP ON HOP OFF TOUR

Zip between seaside sights in dreamy Nice on an open-top double-decker bus. Cruise along the Baie des Anges on the famed Promenade des Anglais, listen to engaging commentary onboard, and jump off whenever you want to get a closer look at museums, neighborhoods, and landmarks. Step onto a comfortable double-decker bus and settle into a seat, listening to entertaining stories and historical facts about this cosmopolitan Côte d’Azur city. Ride the sun-soaked streets as you admire the opulent architecture of this fabled resort destination and the centuries-old buildings of the Vieilleville.

DAY 10: DEPARTURE FROM NICE

Transfer to Airport for your return flight.

Have a happy and safe trip!!
